member.name: IUpdateIDList.Update
member.summary: Updates the provided child based on the parameters specified by the provided .
member.param: An interface on a bind context object. Used to specify parameters for updating the child . This value can be NULL.
A pointer to the child relative to the parent folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IUpdateIDList
member.summary: Provides a method to update the of the child of a folder object.
